pets.name: Max
pets.description: Max is a friendly dog. He loves to play fetch and is great with kids.

pets.name: Blacky
pets.description: Blacky is a well-behaved dog. She enjoys long walks and belly rubs.

pets.name: Charlie
pets.description: Charlie is a cuddly dog. He loves nap time and is friendly with other dogs.

pets.name: Tuffy
pets.description: Tuffy is a playful dog. He's still learning commands but is eager to please.

pets.name: Snowy
pets.description: Snowy is a fun-loving dog. She is obediant and great with other pets

pets.name: Simba
pets.description: Simba is an independent cat. He's low maintenance and likes quiet homes.

pets.name: Milo
pets.description: Milo is a charming cat. She likes playing with toys and climbing on cat trees.

pets.name: Tiger
pets.description: Tiger is a fun-loving cat. He's curious and loves exploring around the house.

pets.name: Luna and Nancy
pets.description: Luna and Nancy are both sweet cats. They are affectionate and love to cuddle on the couch.
